cat.gencat.ctti.canigo.arch.support.mailing

Interface FluentMailService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FluentMailServiceImpl

    public interface FluentMailService
    Servei per enviar emails utilitzant un estil Fluent API.

    Exemples d'utilització: 

     fluentMailService.send(fluentMailService //
                .from("from@test.com") //
                .to("to@test.com") //
                .subject("títol") //
                .message("<html><body>missatge à</body></html>", true) //
 );
 
     fluentMailService.send(fluentMailService //
                .from("from@test.com") //
                .to("to@test.com") //
                .subject("títol") //
                .message("The results are OK.", false) //
                .attachments(new Attachment(logoByteArray, "companyLogo.gif", true),
                                new Attachment(pdfInputStream, "results.pdf", false)) //
 );
    Author:
    alejandro.torras@ticxcat.cat
